=== Set-kind sumti starters ===

le'i tavla

---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base lehi) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))

lo'i prenu cu klama

---
(source_file
  (statement
    (sumti (sumti_base lohi) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (word))))))
    (selbri (tanru_unit (tanru_atom (brivla))))))
